name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Universe of Dio
name_original: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Universe of Dio
description:
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Universe of Dio is a game made for my school project, Glorious Games. Still work in progress but will soon be finished (Expect to find bugs), there's barely any Jojo fan games so I decided to make a fun platformer starring Jotaro. Comments and feedback is highly appreciated. 

Important Info:

[Right now the "Choose Part" button doesn't work because I haven't implemented it yet.]

[RIGHT CLICK ON INTERACTIONS] (forgot to add a sign that says so)

[CTRL + F] for fullscreen.
